text: The semisoft sign (Ҍ ҍ; italics: Ҍ ҍ) is a letter of the Cyrillic script. It also takes the form of Ꙑ or Ꙑ̇. The semisoft sign is used in the alphabet of the Kildin Sami language, where it makes palatalization (sometimes also called "half-palatalization") of the sequencing stop, /nʲ/, /tʲ/, or /dʲ/. Category:Cyrillic letters
title: Semisoft sign
